### <a name="method-userwidth"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4073">メソッド userWidth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4073">Method userWidth</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4074">ピクセル単位でコントロールの幅を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4074">Sets or returns the width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

    public int userWidth([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4075">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4075">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4076">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4076">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4077">コントロールの幅として使用するピクセル数 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4077">The number of pixels to use as the width of the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4078">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4078">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4079">ユーザーがコントロールの幅として指定したピクセル数。ユーザーが文字の幅を指定しなかった場合は 0 (ゼロ)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4079">The number of pixels that the user specified as the width of the control; 0 (zero) if the user did not specify a character width.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4080">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4080">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4081">userWidth メソッドは、文字数の 6 倍に基づいてピクセル単位の幅を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4081">The userWidth method returns the width in pixels, based on six times the number of characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4082">たとえば、ユーザーのコントロールの幅として 30 文字が指定されている場合、戻り値は 6 \* 30 = 180 となります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4082">For example, if the user has specified 30 characters as the width for the control, the return value is 6 \* 30 = 180.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4083">コントロールの幅を文字で指定するには、コントロールを右クリックして、文字指定を行う設定フォームを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4083">To specify the width of the control in characters, users can right-click the control to open the setup form where the character specification is made.</span></span>

### <a name="method-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4119">メソッド width</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4119">Method width</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4120">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4120">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int width(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4121">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4121">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4122">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4122">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4123">幅の計算方法を示す整数データ型です。オプションです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4123">An Integer data type that indicates how the width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4124">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4124">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4125">幅の計算方法を示す整数データ型です。オプションです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4125">An Integer data type that indicates how the width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4126">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4126">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4127">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4127">The width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4128">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4128">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4129">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4129">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4130">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4130">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4131">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4131">Mode.</span></span>           | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4132">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4132">Width calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4133">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4133">-1 Exact.</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4134">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4134">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4135">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4135">0 Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4136">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4136">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4137">1 列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4137">1 Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4138">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4138">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4139">幅と幅計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4139">The width and width calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4140">メソッド widthMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4140">Method widthMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4141">コントロールの幅の計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4141">Gets or sets the calculation mode of the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4142">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4142">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4143">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4143">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4144">コントロールの幅の計算方法を示す整数データ型値です (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4144">An Integer data type value that indicates how control width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4145">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4145">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4146">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4146">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4147">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4147">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4148">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4148">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4149">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4149">Mode.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4150">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4150">Width Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|---------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4151">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4151">Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4152">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4152">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4153">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4153">Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4154">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4154">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4155">列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4155">Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4156">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4156">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4157">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4157">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4158">メソッド widthValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4158">Method widthValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4159">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4159">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthValue([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4160">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4160">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4161">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4161">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4162">幅をピクセル単位で指定する整数データ型です (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4162">An Integer data type that specifies the width in pixels; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4493">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4493">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4494">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4494">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4495">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4495">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4496">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4496">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4497">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4497">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4498">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4498">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4499">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4499">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4500">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4500">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4501">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4501">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4502">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4502">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4503">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4503">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-bold"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4504">メソッド bold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4504">Method bold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4505">コントロール内のテキストを出力するのに使用されるフォントの重量を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4505">Gets or sets the weight of font used to output text in the control.</span></span>

    public int bold([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4506">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4506">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4507">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4507">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4508">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4508">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4509">0 から 9 までの間の整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4509">An integer value between zero and nine, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4510">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4510">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4511">返される整数には、次のようなフォントの重量が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4511">The integer that is returned contains the weight of the font as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4512">0 既定のフォントの重量を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4512">0 Use the default font weight.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4513">1 シン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4513">1 Thin.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4514">2 エクストラ ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4514">2 Extra-light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4515">3. ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4515">3 Light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4516">4 標準。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4516">4 Normal.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4517">5 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4517">5 Medium.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4518">6 セミボールド。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4518">6 Semibold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4519">7 太字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4519">7 Bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4520">8 極太。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4520">8 Extra-bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4521">9 ヘビー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4521">9 Heavy.</span></span>

|--------|----------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4561">0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4561">0</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4562">ANSI\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4562">ANSI\_CHARSET</span></span>        |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4563">1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4563">1</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4564">DEFAULT\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4564">DEFAULT\_CHARSET</span></span>     |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4565">2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4565">2</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4566">SYMBOL\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4566">SYMBOL\_CHARSET</span></span>      |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4567">77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4567">77</span></span>     | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4568">MAC\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4568">MAC\_CHARSET</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4569">128</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4569">128</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4570">SHIFTJIS\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4570">SHIFTJIS\_CHARSET</span></span>    |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4571">129</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4571">129</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4572">HANGUL\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4572">HANGUL\_CHARSET</span></span>      |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4573">134</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4573">134</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4574">GB2312\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4574">GB2312\_CHARSET</span></span>      |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4575">136</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4575">136</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4576">CHINESEBIG5\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4576">CHINESEBIG5\_CHARSET</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4577">161</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4577">161</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4578">GREEK\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4578">GREEK\_CHARSET</span></span>       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4579">162</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4579">162</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4580">TURKISH\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4580">TURKISH\_CHARSET</span></span>     |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4581">163</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4581">163</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4582">VIETNAMESE\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4582">VIETNAMESE\_CHARSET</span></span>  |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4583">186</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4583">186</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4584">BALTIC\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4584">BALTIC\_CHARSET</span></span>      |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4585">204</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4585">204</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4586">RUSSIAN\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4586">RUSSIAN\_CHARSET</span></span>     |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4587">238</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4587">238</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4588">EASTEUROPE\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4588">EASTEUROPE\_CHARSET</span></span>  |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4608">既定の文字セットは、現在のシステム ロケールに基づいて値に対して設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4608">The default character set is set to a value based on the current system locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4609">たとえば、システム ロケールが英語 (米国) である場合、ANSI\_CHARSET として設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4609">For example, when the system locale is English (United States), it is set as ANSI\_CHARSET.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4610">詳細については、MSDN Web サイト、http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=85972 で LOGFONT 構造を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4610">For more information, see the LOGFONT structure on the MSDN Web site, http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=85972.</span></span>

### <a name="method-colorscheme"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4611">メソッド colorScheme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4611">Method colorScheme</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4612">コントロールの配色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4612">Gets or sets the color scheme of the control.</span></span>

    public int colorScheme([int value])

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4704">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4704">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int height(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4705">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4705">Parameters</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4708">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4708">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4709">ピクセル単位のコントロールの高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4709">The height of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4710">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4710">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4711">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4711">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4712">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4712">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4713">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4713">Mode.</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4714">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4714">Height calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4715">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4715">-1 Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4716">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4716">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4717">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4717">0 Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4718">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4718">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4719">1 列の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4719">1 Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4720">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4720">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4721">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4721">The height and height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4722">メソッド heightMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4722">Method heightMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4723">コントロールの高さの計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4723">Gets or sets a calculation mode for the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4724">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4724">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4725">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4725">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4726">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4726">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4727">計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4727">The calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4728">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4728">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4729">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4729">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4730">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4730">Mode.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4731">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4731">Height Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4732">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4732">Exact.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4733">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4733">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4962">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4962">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int width(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4963">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4963">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4967">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4967">The width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4968">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4968">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4969">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4969">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4970">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4970">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4971">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4971">Mode.</span></span>           | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4972">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4972">Width calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4973">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4973">-1 Exact.</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4974">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4974">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4975">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4975">0 Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4976">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4976">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4977">1 列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4977">1 Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4978">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4978">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4979">幅と幅計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4979">The width and width calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4985">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4985">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4987">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4987">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4988">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4988">Mode.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4989">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4989">Width Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|---------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4992">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4992">Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4993">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4993">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4994">列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4994">Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4995">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4995">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-4996">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-4996">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

### <a name="method-aligncontrol"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5336">メソッド alignControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5336">Method alignControl</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5337">コントロールを配置するかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5337">Determines whether to align the control.</span></span>

    public boolean alignControl([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5338">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5338">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5339">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5339">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5340">プロパティの新しい値 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5340">The new value for the property; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5341">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5341">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5342">コントロールをアラインする必要がある場合は true。それ以外の場合は false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5342">true if the control should be aligned; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5343">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5343">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5344">コントロールの左上隅は、最も長いラベルに従って配置されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5344">The upper-left corner of the control is aligned according to the longest label.</span></span>

### <a name="method-alignment"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5345">メソッド alignment</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5345">Method alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5346">コントロール内のテキストの配置を変更します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5346">Changes the alignment of the text in the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5347">値は左、右、または中央であり、コントロールを適切に揃えます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5347">Values are Left, right, or center, to align the control appropriately.</span></span>

    public int alignment([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5348">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5348">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5349">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5349">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5350">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5350">Return Value</span></span>

### <a name="method-allowedit"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5351">メソッド allowEdit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5351">Method allowEdit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5352">ユーザーがコントロールの内容を変更できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5352">Determines whether the user can change the contents of the control.</span></span>

    public boolean allowEdit([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5353">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5353">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5354">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5354">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5355">allowEdit プロパティに割り当てる値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5355">The value to assign to the allowEdit property.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5356">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5356">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5357">コントロールを編集することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5357">true if the control can be edited; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5358">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5358">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5359">コンテナー コントロールにこのプロパティが設定されると、コンテナー内のすべてのコントロールの変更は無効または有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5359">When this property is set on a container control, modifications are disabled or enabled for all controls within the container.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backgroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5379">メソッド backgroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5379">Method backgroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5380">コントロールの背景色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5380">Gets or sets the background color of the control.</span></span>

    public int backgroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5381">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5381">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5382">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5382">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5383">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5383">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5384">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5384">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5385">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5385">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5386">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5386">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5387">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5387">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5388">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5388">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5389">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5389">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5390">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5390">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5391">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5391">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backstyle"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5392">メソッド backStyle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5392">Method backStyle</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5393">コントロールの背景色を透明にできるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5393">Determines whether the control background can be transparent.</span></span>

    public int backStyle([int value])

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5397">コントロールの背景が透明の場合は 1、それ以外の場合は、0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5397">1 if the control background can be transparent; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

### <a name="method-begindrag"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5398">メソッド beginDrag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5398">Method beginDrag</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5399">ユーザーがフォーム コントロールのドラッグを始めると呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5399">Is called when the user starts to drag a form control.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5402">マウス ポインターの y 座標を示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5402">An integer value that indicates the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5403">座標はコントロールの左上隅を基準にしています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5403">The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5404">y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5404">y</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5405">マウス ポインターの y 座標を示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5405">An integer value that indicates the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5406">座標はコントロールの左上隅を基準にしています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5406">The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5408">イベントが処理された場合は 0 (ゼロ) です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5408">0 (zero) if the event has been handled.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5409">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5409">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5410">このイベントは、コントロールの DragDrop プロパティが有効でない限り発生しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5410">This event is not raised unless the DragDrop property is enabled for the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5411">コントロールをドラッグするには、コントロール領域内でマウス ボタンを押した後、マウス ポインターを移動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5411">To drag a control, a user presses the mouse button in the control area and then moves the mouse pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="method-bold"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5416">メソッド bold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5416">Method bold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5417">コントロール内のテキストを出力するのに使用されるフォントの重量を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5417">Gets or sets the weight of font used to output text in the control.</span></span>

    public int bold([int value])

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5421">0 から 9 までの間の整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5421">An integer value between zero and nine, inclusive.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5423">返される整数には、次のようなフォントの重量が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5423">The integer that is returned contains the weight of the font as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5424">0 既定のフォントの重量を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5424">0 Use the default font weight.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5425">1 シン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5425">1 Thin.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5426">2 エクストラ ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5426">2 Extra-light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5427">3. ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5427">3 Light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5428">4 標準。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5428">4 Normal.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5429">5 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5429">5 Medium.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5430">6 セミボールド。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5430">6 Semibold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5431">7 太字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5431">7 Bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5432">8 極太。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5432">8 Extra-bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5433">9 ヘビー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5433">9 Heavy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5441">返される整数には、次のようなコントロールの境界線のスタイルが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5441">The integer that is returned contains the style of the borderline of the control as follows.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5442">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5442">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5443">説明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5443">Description.</span></span> |
|--------|--------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5444">0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5444">0</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5445">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5445">Auto.</span></span>        |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5446">1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5446">1</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5447">3D。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5447">3D.</span></span>          |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5448">2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5448">2</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5449">単一明細行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5449">Single line.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5450">3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5450">3</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5451">均一。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5451">Flat.</span></span>        |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5452">4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5452">4</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5453">なし。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5453">None.</span></span>        |

### <a name="method-buttondisplay"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5454">メソッド buttonDisplay</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5454">Method buttonDisplay</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5455">ボタン コントロールの外観を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5455">Gets or sets the appearance of the button control.</span></span>

    public int buttonDisplay([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5456">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5456">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5457">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5457">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5458">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5458">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5459">ゼロから 5 までの整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5459">An integer between zero and five, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5460">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5460">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5461">プロパティ値は、テキスト、画像、またはその両方のいずれをボタンに表示するかを定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5461">The value of the property defines whether the text, the image, or both should be displayed on the button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5462">このプロパティは、テキストと画像の両方が表示されている場合は、テキストと画像の相対位置も制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5462">This property also controls relative positions of text and image if both are displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5463">返される整数値には、次のようなボタン コントロールの外観が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5463">The integer value that is returned contains the appearance of the button control as follows.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5464">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5464">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5465">説明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5465">Description.</span></span>                                                     |
|--------|------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5466">0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5466">0</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5467">テキストのみ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5467">Text only.</span></span>                                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5468">1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5468">1</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5469">イメージのみ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5469">Image Only.</span></span>                                                      |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5470">2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5470">2</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5471">テキストと画像。画像はテキストの下に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5471">Text and image; the image is displayed below the text.</span></span>           |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5472">3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5472">3</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5473">テキストと画像。画像はテキストの上に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5473">Text and image; the image is displayed above the text.</span></span>           |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5474">4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5474">4</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5475">テキストと画像。画像はテキストの左に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5475">Text and image; the image is displayed to the left of the text.</span></span>  |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5476">5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5476">5</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5477">テキストと画像。画像はテキストの右に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5477">Text and image; the image is displayed to the right of the text.</span></span> |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5479">コントロールのサイズを取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5479">Retrieves the size of the control.</span></span>

### <a name="method-configurationkey"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5569">メソッド configurationKey</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5569">Method configurationKey</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5570">コントロールに割り当てられるコンフィギュレーション キーを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5570">Gets or sets the configuration key that is assigned to the control.</span></span>

    public ConfigurationKeyId configurationKey([ConfigurationKeyId value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5571">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5571">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5572">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5572">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5573">コントロールに割り当てられているコンフィギュレーション キーの ID。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5573">The ID of the configuration key being assigned to the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5574">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5574">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5575">コントロールに割り当てられるコンフィギュレーションの ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5575">The identifier of the configuration key that is assigned to the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5576">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5576">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5577">コンフィギュレーション キーは、このコントロールを表示するかどうかを決定するために使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5577">The configuration key is used to determine whether this control can be displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5578">コンフィギュレーション キーがシステムで無効な場合、コントロールはフォームで表示されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5578">If the configuration key is disabled in the system, the control is not displayed in the form.</span></span>

### <a name="method-configurationkeyex"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5579">メソッド configurationKeyEx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5579">Method configurationKeyEx</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5580">コントロールが有効になっているコンフィギュレーション キーの ID を含む一覧を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5580">Retrieves a list that contains the IDs of configuration keys that are in effect for the control.</span></span>

    public List configurationKeyEx()

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5581">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5581">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5582">コントロールが有効になっているコンフィギュレーション キーの ID を含む一覧。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5582">A list that contains the IDs of configuration keys that are in effect for the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5583">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5583">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5584">返されるリストに重複 ID は含まれません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5584">The returned list does not contain duplicate IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5585">コントロールがデータソースにバインドされている場合、返された構成キー ID のリストには、テーブルとフィールドの構成キー ID も含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5585">If the control is bound to a data source, the returned list of configuration key IDs also includes the configuration key ID for the table and field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5586">また、返されたリストには、プロパティ、拡張データ型、または enumType メソッドに適用される任意のコンフィギュレーション キー ID が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5586">The returned list also contains any configuration key IDs that are applied to the properties, extended data type, or enumType methods.</span></span>

### <a name="method-copycallerquery"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5587">メソッド copyCallerQuery</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5587">Method copyCallerQuery</span></span>

    public int copyCallerQuery([int value])

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5700">コントロールが有効かどうかを指定するブール値; オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5700">A Boolean value that specifies whether the control is enabled; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5701">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5701">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5702">オブジェクトが有効である場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5702">true if the object is enabled; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5703">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5703">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5704">有効になっているプロパティを使用すると、実行時にコントロールを有効または無効にできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5704">The enabled property allows controls to be enabled or disabled at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5705">たとえば、アプリケーションの現在の状態には適用されないオブジェクトを無効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5705">For example, you can disable objects that do not apply to the current state of the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5706">また、読み取り専用情報を提供する、エラー メッセージなどの、表示のためにのみ使用されるコントロールを無効にすることもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5706">You can also disable a control that is used only for display purposes, such as an error message, which provides read-only information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5712">Tahoma や Verdana など、使用するフォントの名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5712">The name of the font to use, such as Tahoma or Verdana.</span></span>

### <a name="method-foregroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5723">メソッド foregroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5723">Method foregroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5724">使用するコントロールのテキストの色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5724">Gets or sets the text color for the control to use.</span></span>

    public int foregroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5725">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5725">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5726">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5726">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5727">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5727">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5728">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5728">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5729">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5729">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5730">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5730">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5731">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5731">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5732">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5732">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5733">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5733">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5734">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5734">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5735">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5735">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5754">メソッド height</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5754">Method height</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5755">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5755">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int height(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5756">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5756">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5757">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5757">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5758">高さの計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5758">An integer that indicates how the height is calculated; optional.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5759">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5759">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5760">高さの計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5760">An integer that indicates how the height is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5761">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5761">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5762">ピクセル単位のコントロールの高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5762">The height of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5763">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5763">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5764">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5764">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5765">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5765">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5766">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5766">Mode.</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5767">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5767">Height calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5768">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5768">-1 Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5769">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5769">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5770">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5770">0 Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5771">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5771">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5772">1 列の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5772">1 Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5773">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5773">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5774">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5774">The height and height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5775">メソッド heightMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5775">Method heightMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5776">コントロールの高さの計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5776">Gets or sets a calculation mode for the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5777">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5777">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5778">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5778">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5779">コントロールの高さの計算方法を示す整数値。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5779">An integer value that indicates how control height is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5780">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5780">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5781">計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5781">The calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5782">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5782">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5783">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5783">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5784">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5784">Mode.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5785">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5785">Height Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5786">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5786">Exact.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5787">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5787">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5788">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5788">Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5789">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5789">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5790">列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5790">Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5791">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5791">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5792">計算モードが [自動] または [列の高さ] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの高さが変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5792">The height of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column height.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5793">メソッド heightValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5793">Method heightValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5794">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5794">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5796">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5796">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5797">高さをピクセル単位で指定する整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5797">An integer that specifies the height in pixels; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5798">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5798">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5799">ピクセル単位の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5799">The height in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5800">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5800">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5801">正確な高さ計算モードが使用されていない限り、コントロールの高さは変更されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5801">The height of the control is not changed unless the exact height calculation mode is used.</span></span>

### <a name="method-isusersetupenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5848">メソッド isUserSetupEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5848">Method isUserSetupEnabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5849">コントロールが、特定のレベルのカスタマイズを許可するかどうかを示す値を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5849">Retrieves a value that indicates whether the control allows for the specified level of customization.</span></span>

    public boolean isUserSetupEnabled(int neededSetupRights)

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5850">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5850">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5851">neededSetupRights</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5851">neededSetupRights</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5852">コントロールに対して照会されるカスタマイズのレベルを指定する FormAllowUserSetup 列挙の値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5852">A value from the FormAllowUserSetup enumeration that specifies the level of customization that is being queried for the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5853">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5853">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5854">neededSetupRights パラメーターで指定されたカスタマイズのレベルがコントロール、デザイン、および親コンテナーで許可される場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5854">true if the control, design, and parent containers allow for the level of customization that is specified by the neededSetupRights parameter; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5855">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5855">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5856">次のテーブルでは、neededSetupRights パラメーターの値について説明します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5856">The following table describes the values for the neededSetupRights parameter.</span></span>

|                                  |                                                                                                                                  |
|----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5857">FormAllowUserSetup::No 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5857">FormAllowUserSetup::No 0</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5858">コントロールに対する変更は加えられません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5858">No changes can be made to the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5859">この値が neededSetupRights パラメーターに対して設定されている場合、メソッドは常に true を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5859">If this value is set for the neededSetupRights parameter, the method always returns true.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5860">FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5860">FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted 1</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5861">ユーザーはコントロールの、編集可能、表示、スキップ、ラベル、幅の各プロパティを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5861">The user can change the editable, visible, skip, label, and width properties of the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5862">ユーザーがコントロールを移動できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5862">The user cannot move the control.</span></span>   |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5863">FormAllowUserSetup::Yes 2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5863">FormAllowUserSetup::Yes 2</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5864">ユーザーはコントロールの、編集可能、表示、スキップ、ラベル、幅の各プロパティを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5864">The user can change the editable, visible, skip, label, and width properties of the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5865">ユーザーはコントロールを移動することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5865">The user can also move the control.</span></span> |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5866">「true」を返すこのメソッドについては、デザインの AllowUserSetup プロパティとすべての親コンテナが、neededSetupRights パラメータで指定されたアクセスレベルを許可している必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5866">For this method to return true, the AllowUserSetup property for the design and all parent containers must allow for the level of access that is specified by the neededSetupRights parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="method-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5986">メソッド名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5986">Method name</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5987">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または他のアプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5987">Gets or sets the name that is used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or other Finance and Operations application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5988">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5988">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5989">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5989">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5990">コントロールに割り当てる名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5990">The name to assign to the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5991">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5991">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5992">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5992">The name that is used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5993">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5993">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5994">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5994">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5995">文字で始める必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5995">It must begin with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5996">250 文字を超えることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5996">It cannot exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5997">数字とアンダースコア (\_) 文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5997">It can include numbers and underscore (\_) characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5998">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5998">It cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-5999">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-5999">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enums, or classes.</span></span>

### <a name="method-neededpermission"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6000">メソッド neededPermission</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6000">Method neededPermission</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6001">コントロールへのアクセスを許可するために必要な最小限のアクセス許可レベルを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6001">Specifies the minimum permission level that is required to be allowed access to the control.</span></span>

    public int neededPermission([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6002">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6002">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6003">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6003">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6004">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6004">Return Value</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6005">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6005">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6006">可能なフィールドの値は次のいずれかです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6006">The possible values are as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6007">None</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6007">None</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6008">既読</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6008">Read</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6009">更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6009">Update</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6010">新規</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6010">Create</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6011">修正</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6011">Correct</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6012">消去</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6012">Delete</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6013">マニュアル</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6013">Manual</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6014">既定値はなしです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6014">The default value is None.</span></span>

### <a name="method-needsrecord"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6015">メソッド needsRecord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6015">Method needsRecord</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6196">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6196">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6197">ユーザーは、コントロールが表示されたときにコントロールを右クリックするか、元のコントロールが非表示のときに他のコントロールを右クリックして、コントロールを非表示にするかどうかを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6197">The user specifies whether a control is hidden by right-clicking the control when it is viewable or by right-clicking another control when the original control is hidden.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6198">右クリックにより、コントロールを非表示または表示するために使用できるメニューを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6198">A right-click opens a menu that can be used to hide or display the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6199">このメソッドを使用すると、プログラムによって値を決定して設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6199">This method lets you programmatically determine and set the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6232">userSkip プロパティに割り当てる値 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6232">The value to assign to the userSkip property; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6233">コントロールをスキップするユーザーの設定が有効な場合、この値は 1、それ以外の場合の値は 0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6233">The value is 1 if the user setting to skip the control is in effect; otherwise, the value is 0.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6234">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6234">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6235">コントロールをスキップするユーザーの設定が有効な場合は 1、それ以外の場合は 0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6235">1 if the user setting to skip the control is in effect; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

### <a name="method-userwidth"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6236">メソッド userWidth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6236">Method userWidth</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6237">ピクセル単位でコントロールの幅を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6237">Sets or returns the width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

    public int userWidth([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6238">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6238">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6239">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6239">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6240">コントロールの幅として使用するピクセル数 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6240">The number of pixels to use as the width of the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6241">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6241">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6242">ユーザーがコントロールの幅として指定したピクセル数。ユーザーが文字の幅を指定しなかった場合は 0 (ゼロ)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6242">The number of pixels that the user specified as the width of the control; 0 (zero) if the user did not specify a character width.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6243">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6243">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6244">userWidth メソッドは、文字数の 6 倍に基づいてピクセル単位の幅を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6244">The userWidth method returns the width in pixels, based on six times the number of characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6245">たとえば、ユーザーのコントロールの幅として 30 文字が指定されている場合、戻り値は 6 \* 30 = 180 となります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6245">For example, if the user has specified 30 characters as the width of the control, the return value is 6 \* 30 = 180.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6246">コントロールの幅を文字で指定するには、コントロールを右クリックして、文字指定を行う設定フォームを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6246">To specify the width of the control in characters, users can right-click the control to open the setup form where the character specification is made.</span></span>

    public boolean value([boolean value])
