### <a name="method-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6280">メソッド width</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6280">Method width</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6281">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6281">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int width(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6282">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6282">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6283">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6283">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6284">幅の計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6284">An integer that indicates how the width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6285">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6285">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6286">幅の計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6286">An integer that indicates how the width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6287">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6287">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6288">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6288">The width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6289">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6289">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6290">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6290">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6291">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6291">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6292">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6292">Mode.</span></span>           | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6293">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6293">Width calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6294">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6294">-1 Exact.</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6295">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6295">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6296">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6296">0 Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6297">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6297">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6298">1 列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6298">1 Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6299">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6299">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6300">幅と幅計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6300">The width and width calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6301">メソッド widthMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6301">Method widthMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6302">コントロールの幅の計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6302">Gets or sets the calculation mode of the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6303">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6303">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6304">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6304">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6305">コントロール幅の計算方法を示す整数値。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6305">An integer value that indicates how control width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6306">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6306">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6307">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6307">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6308">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6308">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6309">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6309">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6310">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6310">Mode.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6311">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6311">Width Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|---------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6312">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6312">Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6313">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6313">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6314">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6314">Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6315">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6315">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6316">列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6316">Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6317">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6317">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6318">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6318">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6319">メソッド widthValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6319">Method widthValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6320">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6320">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6324">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6324">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6325">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6325">The width in pixels of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6326">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6326">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6327">コントロールの幅を変更するには、正確な幅の計算モードを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6327">To change the width of the control, use the exact width calculation mode.</span></span>

    public boolean autoDeclaration([boolean value])

### <a name="method-backgroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6754">メソッド backgroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6754">Method backgroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6755">コントロールの背景色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6755">Gets or sets the background color of the control.</span></span>

    public int backgroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6756">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6756">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6757">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6757">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6758">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6758">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6759">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6759">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6760">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6760">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6761">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6761">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6762">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6762">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6763">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6763">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6764">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6764">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6765">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6765">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6766">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6766">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backstyle"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6767">メソッド backStyle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6767">Method backStyle</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6768">コントロールの背景色を透明にできるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6768">Determines whether the control background can be transparent.</span></span>

    public int backStyle([int value])

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6772">コントロールの背景が透明の場合は 1、それ以外の場合は、0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6772">1 if the control background can be transparent; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

### <a name="method-begindrag"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6773">メソッド beginDrag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6773">Method beginDrag</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6774">ユーザーがフォーム コントロールのドラッグを始めると呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6774">Is called when the user starts to drag a form control.</span></span>

    public int beginDrag(int x, int y)

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6775">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6775">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6777">マウス ポインターの y 座標を示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6777">An integer value that indicates the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6778">座標はコントロールの左上隅を基準にしています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6778">The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6779">y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6779">y</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6780">マウス ポインターの y 座標を示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6780">An integer value that indicates the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6781">座標はコントロールの左上隅を基準にしています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6781">The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6782">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6782">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6783">イベントが処理された場合は 0 (ゼロ) です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6783">0 (zero) if the event has been handled.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6784">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6784">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6785">このイベントは、コントロールの DragDrop プロパティが有効でない限り発生しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6785">This event is not raised unless the DragDrop property is enabled for the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6786">コントロールをドラッグするには、コントロール領域内でマウス ボタンを押した後、マウス ポインターを移動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6786">To drag a control, a user presses the mouse button in the control area and then moves the mouse pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="method-bold"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6787">メソッド bold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6787">Method bold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6788">コントロール内のテキストを出力するのに使用されるフォントの重量を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6788">Gets or sets the weight of font used to output text in the control.</span></span>

    public int bold([int value])

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6792">0 から 9 までの間の整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6792">An integer value between zero and nine, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6793">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6793">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6794">返される整数には、次のようなフォントの重量が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6794">The integer that is returned contains the weight of the font as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6795">0 既定のフォントの重量を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6795">0 Use the default font weight.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6796">1 シン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6796">1 Thin.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6797">2 エクストラ ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6797">2 Extra-light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6798">3. ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6798">3 Light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6799">4 標準。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6799">4 Normal.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6800">5 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6800">5 Medium.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6801">6 セミボールド。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6801">6 Semibold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6802">7 太字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6802">7 Bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6803">8 極太。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6803">8 Extra-bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6804">9 ヘビー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6804">9 Heavy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6844">フォントの文字セットを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6844">Gets or sets the character set of the font.</span></span>

    public int characterSet([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6845">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6845">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6846">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6846">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6847">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6847">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6848">フォントの文字セット示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6848">An integer value that indicates the character set of the font.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6849">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6849">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6850">返される整数の値は、次のテーブルに従って文字セットを示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6850">The values for the integer that is returned indicate the character set according to the following table:</span></span>

### <a name="method-configurationkey"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6945">メソッド configurationKey</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6945">Method configurationKey</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6946">コントロールに割り当てられるコンフィギュレーション キーを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6946">Gets or sets the configuration key that is assigned to the control.</span></span>

    public ConfigurationKeyId configurationKey([ConfigurationKeyId value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6947">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6947">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6948">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6948">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6949">コントロールに割り当てられているコンフィギュレーション キーの ID。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6949">The ID of the configuration key being assigned to the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6950">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6950">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6951">コントロールに割り当てられるコンフィギュレーションの ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6951">The identifier of the configuration key that is assigned to the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6952">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6952">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6953">コンフィギュレーション キーは、このコントロールを表示するかどうかを決定するために使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6953">The configuration key is used to determine whether this control can be displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6954">コンフィギュレーション キーがシステムで無効な場合、コントロールはフォームで表示されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6954">If the configuration key is disabled in the system, the control is not displayed in the form.</span></span>

### <a name="method-configurationkeyex"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6955">メソッド configurationKeyEx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6955">Method configurationKeyEx</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6956">コントロールが有効になっているコンフィギュレーション キーの ID を含む一覧を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6956">Retrieves a list that contains the IDs of configuration keys that are in effect for the control.</span></span>

    public List configurationKeyEx()

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6957">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6957">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6958">コントロールが有効になっているコンフィギュレーション キーの ID を含む一覧。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6958">A list that contains the IDs of configuration keys that are in effect for the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6959">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6959">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6960">返されるリストに重複 ID は含まれません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6960">The returned list does not contain duplicate IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6961">コントロールがデータソースにバインドされている場合、返された構成キー ID のリストには、テーブルとフィールドの構成キー ID も含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6961">If the control is bound to a data source, the returned list of configuration key IDs also includes the configuration key ID for the table and field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-6962">また、返されたリストには、プロパティ、拡張データ型、または enumType メソッドに適用される任意のコンフィギュレーション キー ID が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-6962">The returned list also contains any configuration key IDs that are applied to the properties, extended data type, or enumType methods.</span></span>

### <a name="method-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7046">メソッド enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7046">Method enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7047">オブジェクトを有効または無効にするかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7047">Determines whether to enable or disable the object.</span></span>

    public boolean enabled([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7048">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7048">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7049">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7049">value</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7051">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7051">Return Value</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7053">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7053">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7054">有効になっているプロパティを使用すると、実行時にコントロールを有効または無効にできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7054">The enabled property allows controls to be enabled or disabled at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7055">たとえば、アプリケーションの現在の状態には適用されないオブジェクトを無効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7055">For example, you can disable objects that do not apply to the current state of the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7056">また、読み取り専用情報を提供する、エラー メッセージなどの、表示のためにのみ使用されるコントロールを無効にすることもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7056">You can also disable a control that is used only for display purposes, such as an error message, which provides read-only information.</span></span>

### <a name="method-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7080">メソッド height</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7080">Method height</span></span>

    public int height(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7082">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7082">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7083">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7083">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7084">高さの計算方法を示す整数データ型。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7084">An integer data type that indicates how the height is calculated; optional.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7085">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7085">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7086">高さの計算方法を示す整数データ型。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7086">An integer data type that indicates how the height is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7087">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7087">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7088">ピクセル単位のコントロールの高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7088">The height of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7089">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7089">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7090">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7090">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7091">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7091">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7092">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7092">Mode.</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7093">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7093">Height calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7094">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7094">-1 Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7095">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7095">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7096">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7096">0 Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7097">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7097">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7098">1 列の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7098">1 Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7099">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7099">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7100">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7100">The height and height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7101">メソッド heightMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7101">Method heightMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7104">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7104">value</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7106">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7106">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7107">計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7107">The calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7108">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7108">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7109">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7109">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7110">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7110">Mode.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7111">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7111">Height Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7112">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7112">Exact.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7113">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7113">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7114">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7114">Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7115">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7115">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7116">列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7116">Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7117">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7117">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7118">計算モードが [自動] または [列の高さ] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの高さが変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7118">The height of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column height.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7178">コントロールに対して照会されるカスタマイズのレベルを指定する FormAllowUserSetup 列挙の値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7178">A value from the FormAllowUserSetup enumeration that specifies the level of customization that is being queried for the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7179">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7179">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7180">neededSetupRights パラメーターで指定されたカスタマイズのレベルがコントロール、デザイン、および親コンテナーで許可される場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7180">true if the control, design, and parent containers allow for the level of customization that is specified by the neededSetupRights parameter; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7181">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7181">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7182">次のテーブルでは、neededSetupRights パラメーターの値について説明します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7182">The following table describes the values for the neededSetupRights parameter.</span></span>

|                                  |                                                                                                                                  |
|----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7183">FormAllowUserSetup::No 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7183">FormAllowUserSetup::No 0</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7184">コントロールに対する変更は加えられません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7184">No changes can be made to the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7185">この値が neededSetupRights パラメーターに対して設定されている場合、メソッドは常に true を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7185">If this value is set for the neededSetupRights parameter, the method always returns true.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7186">FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7186">FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted 1</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7187">ユーザーはコントロールの、編集可能、表示、スキップ、ラベル、幅の各プロパティを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7187">The user can change the editable, visible, skip, label, and width properties of the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7188">ユーザーがコントロールを移動できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7188">The user cannot move the control.</span></span>   |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7189">FormAllowUserSetup::Yes 2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7189">FormAllowUserSetup::Yes 2</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7190">ユーザーはコントロールの、編集可能、表示、スキップ、ラベル、幅の各プロパティを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7190">The user can change the editable, visible, skip, label, and width properties of the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7191">ユーザーはコントロールを移動することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7191">The user can also move the control.</span></span> |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7192">「true」を返すこのメソッドについては、デザインの AllowUserSetup プロパティとすべての親コンテナが、neededSetupRights パラメータで指定されたアクセスレベルを許可している必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7192">For this method to return true, the AllowUserSetup property for the design and all parent containers must allow for the level of access that is specified by the neededSetupRights parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="method-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7317">メソッド名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7317">Method name</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7318">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または他のアプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7318">Gets or sets the name that is used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or other Finance and Operations application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7319">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7319">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7320">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7320">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7321">コントロールに割り当てる名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7321">The name to assign to the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7322">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7322">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7323">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7323">The name that is used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7324">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7324">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7325">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7325">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7326">文字で始める必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7326">It must begin with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7327">250 文字を超えることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7327">It cannot exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7328">数字とアンダースコア (\_) 文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7328">It can include numbers and underscore (\_) characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7329">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7329">It cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7330">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7330">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enums, or classes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7471">コントロールがユーザーから非表示になっているかどうかを示す値を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7471">Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the control is hidden from the user.</span></span>

    public int userHide([int value])

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7477">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7477">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7478">ユーザーは、コントロールが表示されたときにコントロールを右クリックするか、元のコントロールが非表示のときに他のコントロールを右クリックして、コントロールを非表示にするかどうかを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7478">The user specifies whether a control is hidden by right-clicking the control when it is viewable or by right-clicking another control when the original control is hidden.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7479">右クリックにより、コントロールを非表示または表示するために使用できるメニューを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7479">A right-click opens a menu that can be used to hide or display the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7480">このメソッドを使用すると、プログラムによって値を決定して設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7480">This method lets you programmatically determine and set the value.</span></span>

    public int userSkip([int value])

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7513">userSkip プロパティに割り当てる値 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7513">The value to assign to the userSkip property; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7514">コントロールをスキップするユーザーの設定が有効な場合、この値は 1、それ以外の場合の値は 0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7514">The value is 1 if the user setting to skip the control is in effect; otherwise, the value is 0.</span></span>

### <a name="method-userwidth"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7517">メソッド userWidth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7517">Method userWidth</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7518">ピクセル単位でコントロールの幅を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7518">Sets or returns the width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

    public int userWidth([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7519">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7519">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7520">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7520">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7521">コントロールの幅として使用するピクセル数 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7521">The number of pixels to use as the width of the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7522">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7522">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7523">ユーザーがコントロールの幅として指定したピクセル数。ユーザーが文字の幅を指定しなかった場合は 0 (ゼロ)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7523">The number of pixels that the user specified as the width of the control; 0 (zero) if the user did not specify a character width.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7524">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7524">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7525">userWidth メソッドは、文字数の 6 倍に基づいてピクセル単位の幅を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7525">The userWidth method returns the width in pixels, based on six times the number of characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7526">たとえば、ユーザーのコントロールの幅として 30 文字が指定されている場合、戻り値は 6 \* 30 = 180 となります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7526">For example, if the user has specified 30 characters as the width of the control, the return value is 6 \* 30 = 180.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7527">コントロールの幅を文字で指定するには、コントロールを右クリックして、文字指定を行う設定フォームを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7527">To specify the width of the control in characters, users can right-click the control to open the setup form where the character specification is made.</span></span>

### <a name="method-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7561">メソッド width</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7561">Method width</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7562">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7562">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int width(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7563">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7563">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7564">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7564">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7565">幅の計算方法を示す整数データ型。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7565">An integer data type that indicates how the width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7566">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7566">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7567">幅の計算方法を示す整数データ型。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7567">An integer data type that indicates how the width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7568">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7568">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7569">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7569">The width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7570">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7570">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7571">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7571">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7572">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7572">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7573">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7573">Mode.</span></span>           | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7574">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7574">Width calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7575">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7575">-1 Exact.</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7576">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7576">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7577">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7577">0 Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7578">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7578">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7579">1 列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7579">1 Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7580">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7580">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7581">幅と幅計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7581">The width and width calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7582">メソッド widthMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7582">Method widthMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7583">コントロールの幅の計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7583">Gets or sets the calculation mode of the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7584">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7584">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7585">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7585">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7586">コントロールの幅の計算方法を示す整数データ型値。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7586">An integer data type value that indicates how control width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7587">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7587">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7588">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7588">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7589">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7589">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7590">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7590">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7591">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7591">Mode.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7592">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7592">Width Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|---------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7593">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7593">Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7594">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7594">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7595">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7595">Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7596">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7596">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7597">列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7597">Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7598">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7598">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7599">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7599">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7600">メソッド widthValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7600">Method widthValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dfabf-7601">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dfabf-7601">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthValue([int value])
